comment.author: Raelee
comment.text: Sad hillary has to hold free concerts to get people to show up to hear her speak. She is such a pathetic PIG!!!! Trump arrives on his jet....and thousands flock to him :) love it!!!! Trump is winning people!!! He is taking all states and running away with this election!!!! Hillary supporters.....i will pray for you.

replies.author: Tayler
replies.text: I hope you are enjoying your delusions as much as I am.

replies.author: Raelee
replies.text: Ah right back at you. Enjoy your delusional thoughts of hillary making our country a better place.

replies.author: Daniel
replies.text: ................. I don't think any of the Hillary supporters would like your prayer. But I would like to point out, you say he arrives in a Jet, flauting his weath..... while Hillary wants to speak out to as many people as possible using free concerts...... I merely restated what you said and removed the insulting statements about both... and I think... its easy to see who is more fit for presidency........
